prompts: Create an Electric-type Pokemon that has a sleek, bipedal design with bright yellow color accents.
Show me a Pokemon resembling Ampharos but with a unique twist, like having wings or a different tail.
Imagine a new evolution of Ampharos that incorporates dragon-like features and a deeper shade of yellow.
Design a Pokemon that combines Ampharos' characteristics with a mystical aura, showcasing glowing elements.
Give me a concept for a legendary Electric-type Pokemon with Ampharos' body shape but a more majestic look.
Generate a cute Electric-type Pokemon that can evolve from Ampharos, featuring rounder shapes and softer colors.
Make an Ampharos variant that dwells in urban environments with graffiti-inspired designs and vibrant colors.

distinctive_features: Long tail with a red orb
